/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Trees and streetlights punctuate the scene, adding elements of nature and illumination to the urban setting. Vehicles, including cars and buses, are scattered throughout the street, indicating a busy time of day. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of being in the midst of the action.
